# Introduction

This is a deeper analysis of spotify songs using the [30000 Spotify Songs](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/joebeachcapital/30000-spotify-songs){target="blank"} dataset. This is an extension to the exploratory analysis of Spotify songs: [Spotify Songs v1](https://alienjao.quarto.pub/spotify-songs/pages/index.html){target="blank"}.
